Save Money - Reduce Waste - Be Creative

Welcome to the Community Art Supply Exchange, an organization for sharing and reusing art and craft supplies to reduce waste.
All materials are free.
Interested in trying a new hobby without investing money into it yet?
Pick out something new from the Community Art Supply Exchange
Running low on supplies and want to help prevent unnecessary waste?
Pick up what you need at the Community Art Supply Exchange
Have leftover supplies from a craft that didnâ€™t resonate with you?
Drop off supplies for someone else to try
Available items include paints, drawing supplies, wood, paper, fibers and more!
